# Kevin W. Griffin - Independent .NET & Azure Consultant

> 16-time Microsoft MVP helping teams build, scale, and modernize .NET applications.

## Primary Pages

- /faq: Frequently asked questions about Kevin Griffin, .NET consulting, Azure architecture, and working with a Microsoft MVP
- /about: Background, credentials, and expertise areas for Kevin W. Griffin
- /consulting: Consulting services for ASP.NET Core, Azure, and application modernization
- /courses: Training courses including SignalR Mastery
- /articles: Technical blog posts on .NET, Azure, SignalR, and software development

## Summary

Kevin Griffin is an independent software consultant and 16-time Microsoft MVP based in Virginia. He specializes in ASP.NET Core, Microsoft Azure cloud architecture, SignalR real-time applications, and .NET modernization. Kevin runs Swift Kick, has led the Hampton Roads .NET User Group since 2009, and founded RevolutionVA (the nonprofit behind Hampton Roads DevFest).

## Expertise

- ASP.NET Core & .NET 9+
- Microsoft Azure (App Service, Functions, Container Apps, SignalR Service)
- SignalR real-time web development
- Legacy .NET Framework modernization
- Vue.js frontends with .NET backends
- Clean Architecture & Domain-Driven Design
